title: Boeing Crisis, Huawei/ZTE Legislation, Rep. Jim Banks
itunes:title: Boeing Crisis, Huawei/ZTE Legislation, Rep. Jim Banks
description:
Kevin discussed the global rush to halt Boeing flights and new legislation aimed at monitoring sensitive university research by Chinese telecommunications gear makers Huawei and ZTE with guests Congressman Jim Banks, R-Indiana, Kurt Bardella, Democratic Political Columnist & Brian Darling former Senior Communications Director for Sen. Rand Paul.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
